office: Northeastern progressive Democrat, Senior Member of Democratic Leadership, and Member of the Appropriations Committee
description: Northeastern progressive Democrat, Senior Member of Democratic Leadership, and Member of the Appropriations Committee seeks an experienced speechwriter to join busy, high-functioning office. The individual will work closely with the legislative staff and communications director and take the lead on crafting speeches and op-ed columns. Candidates must possess excellent and proven writing and organizational skills and the ability to grasp complex policy concepts, think strategically, and multitask effectively under tight deadlines. Applicants must also have command of the legislative process, sound political judgment, and a sense of humor.
qualifications: Excellent and proven writing and organizational skills
Ability to grasp complex policy concepts
Ability to think strategically
Ability to multitask effectively under tight deadlines
Command of the legislative process
Sound political judgment
Sense of humor
how_to_apply: Please send cover letter, resume, and 2-3 writing samples to: ct03speeches@gmail.com.

description: Texas Democrat seeks a hard-working and experienced legislative staffer to handle various legislative areas. position_title: Analyst for Democratic Staff of Congressional Committee
description: Congressional committee seeks experienced analyst for health policy portfolio. The job requires strong skills in written and oral communication, policy analysis, and quantitative analysis, as well as the ability to work effectively under tight deadline. The ideal candidate will have several years of experience in federal budgeting, familiarity with the legislative process, background in federal health care policy, and a master’s degree in public policy or related field.
how_to_apply: Email resume, two brief writing samples, and cover letter with subject line “analyst position” to Health.Analyst@mail.house.gov – no phone calls or walk-ins.
